channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.description: A new home for expertise in outdoor recreation What is the Outdoor Recreation Research Group? We are the first cross-disciplinary research group in the UK looking at the growing sector of outdoor recreation from all perspectives. Bringing together economists, social scientists, ecologists, engineers and behavioural change and tourism experts, we are the home of expertise in the way we play outdoors â€“ and the important economy behind it. What do we do?
